message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still not able to go above $12,000 for this product. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
